item.title: Congratulations to SML Ph.D. student @bae_inhwan on receiving the 2024-25 PCCW Frank H.T. Rhodes Mission Grant! Her project focuses on combating online toxicity against women and nonbinary persons with tailored persuasion messages using large language models.
item.description: Congratulations to SML Ph.D. student @bae_inhwan on receiving the 2024-25 PCCW Frank H.T. Rhodes Mission Grant! Her project focuses on combating online toxicity against women and nonbinary persons with tailored persuasion messages using large language models.

item.title: SML members @bae_inhwan @isabellemcdaph @haesooheatherk and Julia Sebastien had a lovely meeting with the students @btf_bluetree about youth social media safety! It was great to chat, @ParkChanJun_ , thank you for inviting us! #bluetreefoundation
item.description: SML members @bae_inhwan @isabellemcdaph @haesooheatherk and Julia Sebastien had a lovely meeting with the students @btf_bluetree about youth social media safety! It was great to chat, @ParkChanJun_ , thank you for inviting us! #bluetreefoundation

item.title: We are excited to welcome Han Li, @HanLi_1231 to SML! Han joined our collaborative project on "Deterring Objectionable Behaviors Online," socialsciences.cornell.edu/deterring-obje… She comes to us after her postdoc at the NUS where she worked with Dr. Renwen Zhang (@renwenzhang). Welcome, Han! pic.x.com/SRhPmI1Nu4
item.description: We are excited to welcome Han Li, @HanLi_1231 to SML! Han joined our collaborative project on "Deterring Objectionable Behaviors Online," socialsciences.cornell.edu/deterring-obje…  She comes to us after her postdoc at the NUS where she worked with Dr. Renwen Zhang (@renwenzhang). Welcome, Han! pic.x.com/SRhPmI1Nu4

item.title: Our Ph.D. student @haesooheatherk represented the SML at the UN’s 63rd Session of the Commission for Social Development! Invited by @btf_bluetree, she spoke on what academic research can do to build a safer online future. #BTF webtv.un.org/en/asset/k1t/k… pic.x.com/D9xwUNvC4m
